entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rancheria
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 9 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 9 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Increasing cloudiness. Temperature falling to minus 19 in the morning then rising.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 19 in the morning then rising. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023
